name: Talk Bordeaux
_source: s;Bordeaux;Lady Anuki, you really should be getting some rest.
s;Anuki;And I keep telling you, I'm perfectly fine.
s;Anuki;Or are you just tired, old man? Want to quit?
s;Bordeaux;Ha! I barely broke a sweat against you.
s;Bordeaux;But your dad would demote me to cleaning duty if you got hurt from over-exertion.
